properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SENEGAL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 30 NOV
   BY M/V OCEAN MERMAID IN AREA BOUND BY
   14-13.1N 017-56.3W, 14-13.1N 017-43.3W,
   14-20.1N 017-43.3W, 14-20.2N 017-15.9W,
   14-05.1N 017-15.9W, 13-54.8N 017-19.4W,
   13-27.5N 017-19.3W, 13-27.3N 017-56.3W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2286/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 DEC 19.
